price: Enti wͻnhunuu sε Yɛayε anadwo ama wͻn a wͻde gye wͻn ahome, εna adekyeε nso wͻde hunu adeε (de hwehwε akͻnhoma)? Nokorε sε nsεnkyerεnee wͻ woi mu ma amanfoͻ a wͻgye die.
arabic: أَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ أَنَّا جَعَلۡنَا ٱلَّيۡلَ لِيَسۡكُنُواْ فِيهِ وَٱلنَّهَارَ مُبۡصِرًاۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: alam yaraw annā jaʿalnā al-layla liyaskunū fīhi wal-nahāra mub'ṣiran inna fī dhālika laāyātin liqawmin yu'minūna
